医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的荟萃分析支持补充 omega-3 可减少攻击行为经常吃鱼或服用鱼油补充剂的人可以获得 omega-3 脂肪酸，它对大脑功能起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-meta-analysis-supports-omega-3-supplementation-for-aggression-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-meta-analysis-supports-omega-3-supplementation-for-aggression-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9739fb3-e5e0-49fa-9c59-71139e469f47 Tue, 28 May 2024 14:18:11 -0400 New meta-analysis supports omega-3 supplementation for aggression reduction
新的 T 细胞亚群可能增强癌症免疫治疗由休斯顿大学领导的一组癌症研究人员发现了一种新的 T 细胞亚群，可以改善接受 T 细胞疗法治疗的患者的治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-subset-of-T-cells-may-enhance-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-subset-of-T-cells-may-enhance-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1b32d5c-b931-41be-928c-c5f6fa243c0b Tue, 28 May 2024 13:59:17 -0400 New subset of T cells may enhance cancer immunotherapy
产前空气污染暴露与青少年心理健康问题有关新研究发现，婴儿在子宫内接触空气污染与进入青春期后出现某些心理健康问题有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Prenatal-air-pollution-exposure-linked-to-adolescent-mental-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Prenatal-air-pollution-exposure-linked-to-adolescent-mental-health-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8867c4d9-6c26-4828-8bff-d5cef24b53d6 Tue, 28 May 2024 13:48:00 -0400 Prenatal air pollution exposure linked to adolescent mental health problems
新型光敏药物无需基因改造即可诱导睡眠伏隔核在动机行为和睡眠调节中发挥着关键作用，受腺苷 A2A 受体 (A2AR) 调节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Novel-light-sensitive-drug-induces-sleep-without-genic-modification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Novel-light-sensitive-drug-induces-sleep-without-genic-modification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a77da45-92f1-46ce-a3d3-30e7529bee81 Tue, 28 May 2024 13:41:28 -0400 Novel light-sensitive drug induces sleep without genetic modification
高咖啡因摄入量与帕金森病患者多巴胺功能的变化有关芬兰图尔库大学和图尔库大学医院领导的一项新的国际研究表明，经常摄入大量咖啡因会影响帕金森病患者的多巴胺功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/High-caffeine-conspiration-linked-to-changes-in-dopamine-function-in-Parkinsons-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/High-caffeine-conspiration-linked-to-changes-in-dopamine-function-in-Parkinsons-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d04d0a69-e417-4c0d-b102-c2a2bea39537 Tue, 28 May 2024 13:34:00 -0400 High caffeine consumption linked to changes in dopamine function in Parkinson's patients
研究显示暴食症的持续时间比之前想象的要长暴食症是美国最普遍的饮食失调症，但之前的研究对该疾病的持续时间和复发的可能性提出了相互矛盾的观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Binge-eating-disorder-persists-longer-than-previously-thought-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Binge-eating-disorder-persists-longer-than-previously-thought-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20ec5319-e5aa-45ab-929d-42a320760408 Tue, 28 May 2024 13:15:55 -0400 Binge-eating disorder persists longer than previously thought, study shows
应对 X 疾病和加强全球卫生安全的战略宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。 X 病是新兴传染病的一个象征，它日益成为对全球卫生安全的重大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Strategies-for-addressing-disease-X-and-enhancing-global-health-security.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Strategies-for-addressing-disease-X-and-enhancing-global-health-security.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7e9a919-7e57-4b8d-83d6-f60d3a64e0b6 Tue, 28 May 2024 13:11:12 -0400
利用药剂师的专业知识治疗小病可以节省数百万美元的医疗费用华盛顿州立大学领导的最新研究表明，更多地使用药剂师来治疗小病可能会节省数百万美元的医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Harnessing-pharmacists-expertise-to-treat-minor-illnesses-could-save-millions-in-health-care-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Harnessing-pharmacists-expertise-to-treat-minor-illnesses-could-save-millions-in-health-care-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a8b197a-df7f-4683-ba13-a3f16b74389b Tue, 28 May 2024 13:06:16 -0400 Harnessing pharmacists' expertise to treat minor illnesses could save millions in health care costs
研究揭示大脑口吃的可能根源由芬兰图尔库大学和图尔库大学医院的研究人员领导的一个国际研究小组成功地确定了大脑中口吃的可能根源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Study-uncovers-probable-origin-of-stuttering-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Study-uncovers-probable-origin-of-stuttering-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f98a77f0-7e2d-4138-916c-5212e28c2dc2 Tue, 28 May 2024 11:07:13 -0400 Study uncovers probable origin of stuttering in the brain
研究人员发现蛋白质 XPD 如何检测和修复 DNA 损伤由 Caroline Kisker 领导的维尔茨堡大学研究人员与 Claudia Höbartner 合作，发现了蛋白质 XPD 如何检测严重的 DNA 损伤并控制其修复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Researchers-discover-how- Protein-XPD-detects-and-repairs-DNA-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Researchers-discover-how- Protein-XPD-detects-and-repairs-DNA-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20940e6d-c8f5-4ada-afdb-8191bb11149e Tue, 28 May 2024 11:01:29 -0400 Researchers discover how protein XPD detects and repairs DNA damage
